name: Orthogonal Matching Pursuit 2D in Java
body:
### Orthogonal Matching Pursuit 2D in Java.
For more information on the OMP2D algorithm see [this paper](#) 

### Installing the plugin for ImageJ
1. First Download the ImageJ application from [http://rsb.info.nih.gov/ij/download.html](http://rsb.info.nih.gov/ij/download.html) and the OMP2D plugin from [here](https://github.com/simonsm1/OMP2D/raw/master/OMP2D/OMP2D_Plugin.jar)
2. Extract ImageJ to a folder of your choice and copy OMP2D_Plugin.jar to the plugins folder within.
3. Launch the ImageJ executable and you should find OMP2D listed under the plugins menu.

### About
This Plugin was developed by Matt Simons of Aston University for his Undergrad Mathematics Project see report for further details 

### Acknowledgements
With thanks to [Laura Robollo-Neira](http://www.aston.ac.uk/eas/staff/a-z/dr-laura-rebollo-neira/) for supervising and support this project.
